articles.title: Gainers and Losers: 10 stocks that moved the most on November 24 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: IT stocks were among the biggest drags, while buying was seen in pharma and metal names. Government-owned insurance companies had a good day, gaining up to 20 percent

articles.title: India rupee declines to record closing low, tad down on week - Reuters
articles.description: The Indian rupee ended at a record closing low on Friday, weighed down by weakness in its Asian peers and dollar demand from foreign banks.
articles.content:
MUMBAI, Nov 24 (Reuters) - The Indian rupee ended at a record closing low on Friday, weighed down by weakness in its Asian peers and dollar demand from foreign banks.
